subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Kenny Cooper scored his seventh goal of the season in the 17th minute to lift host F.C. Dallas over the Chicago Fire, 1-0, in Major League Soccer. Dallas (4-5-4) snapped a three-game losing streak and is 10-0-1 in its last 11 home games against Chicago (6-4-1). Chicago’s Justin Mapp almost tied the game in the 70th minute, but his 25-yard shot was wide right.
